headline: A Look At Onsemi (ON) Valuation After $6b Buyback Plan And Gallium Nitride Partnership
summary: ON Semiconductor (ON) is back on investors' radar after announcing a new US$6b share repurchase program effective January 1, along with a collaboration with GlobalFoundries on EU backed Gallium Nitride power semiconductors. See our latest analysis for ON Semiconductor. Those announcements land at a time when ON Semiconductor’s share price has been rebuilding momentum, with a 7 day share price return of 14.29% and a 90 day share price return of 23.85%, even as the 3 year total shareholder...

headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks with Questionable Fundamentals
summary: Wall Street’s bearish price targets for the stocks in this article signal serious concerns. Such forecasts are uncommon in an industry where maintaining cordial corporate relationships often trumps delivering the hard truth.
